cause.description:
Join. Fight the Hodges. Liberate Tim Geringer. Help is a must. Dan Nemes is helping the Hodges. Shear Ya Shub. Joe Kuszaj is leader. Ben Simon is the guardian.
1. Lokbar is the best.
2. Hodges is the worst. Help the cyborgs.
3. Dan Nemes is a traitor
cause.mission: win for lokbar....nothing less, and to win against the hodges of course
cause.name: Fight the Hodges!!
